Articles.Content:
After my first Munar landing I decided to place flag with description (no ladders ):

"That's one small fall for Jeb, a giant leap for Kerbalkind"

Did you ever came up with your own version of Armstrong's words?
Thats one Big Docking Port... But a small Target for a Rocketeer ;D
thats one small stumble for a kerbal, one giant laugh for everyone on tv
That's one slow descent for a kerbal, one fast ascent for science
My first flag on the Mun said "it's only a model".

Mine said. Cheap advertising space.

We need to fund the space race somehow.
one small landing on Vall for Kerbalkind, one giant period without snacks for me.
That's no Mun, it's a space station
No - but I just borrowed Pete Conrad's words for my first Minmus landing. "That might have been a small one for Jeb but it was a long one for me!"
"one small step out onto the Mun, one giant leap to get back up to the pod"

"One small fall for a Kerbal, one giant crash for Kerbal Kind"

-Jeb Kerman, when falling on the Mun for the first time due to a lack of extendable ladders.
"It's really dark here. Really, really dark."
"This rock it's mine. -Pachi Kerman"
"Wait a minute this isn't the Mun."
"That's one small explosion for Jeb, one cataclysmic detonation for all Kerbalkind."
For .22, mine wasn't as momentous as some of my previous saves.
Yeah, my first flag was "I like cheese". It got more random from there.
One small step for... nah, that's overused.

"One small step for a Kerbal, one giant rescue mission for Kerbkind".

He may or may not be there on my first save.

Edited October 20, 2013 by KvickFlygarn87
Typo

The title of my first flag was:

title: "FIRST!!!!!1!!1"

desc: "After hitting the ground at 12m/s, giving Jeb an headache, he forgot his 'A small jump for a kerman, but a huge leap for Kerbinkind' phrase."

Title: Guske's Landing

Description: We left Kerbin as a trio. Now the others are dead. They died a horrible fiery death in the cold blackness of a crater's shadow thousands of miles from home, and all in the name of science. Totally worth it. Situation nominal. - Guske Kerman.
One small step for Jeb, one long jetpack RCS flight back to the pod for kerbalkind.

In my 0.20 Apollo mission album, one image is captioned something like this:

That's one small faceplant for Kerman, one giant faceplant for Kerbal kind.... Wait, that doesn't work....

Uh... Anyway Kerbals have now planted face on the Mun.
